    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2

    Facet Driver_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2:Driver_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2:Driver_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Driver xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" number="Example String Value" objID="driver_1" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <DriverRef>driver_1</DriverRef>
    <ota2-0400:PersonNameSummary>
        <ota2-0400:Prefix>Mr.</ota2-0400:Prefix>
        <ota2-0400:Given>John</ota2-0400:Given>
        <ota2-0400:Middle>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Middle>
        <ota2-0400:Surname>Smith</ota2-0400:Surname>
    </ota2-0400:PersonNameSummary>
    <ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail areaCityCode="202" countryAccessCode="01" defaultInd="true" extension="237" id="telephone_1" pIN="1234" phoneNumber="5555555" remark="Don't call after 10:00PM" role="Home">
        <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>Brand reservations office</ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>Voice</ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>Contact</ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>
    </ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail>
    <ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail areaCityCode="202" countryAccessCode="01" defaultInd="true" extension="237" id="telephone_2" pIN="1234" phoneNumber="5555555" remark="Don't call after 10:00PM" role="Office">
        <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedOut" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Inherit" shareSyncInd="Yes"/>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>Central reservations office</ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>Fax</ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>Daytime contact</ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>
    </ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail>
    <ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail areaCityCode="202" countryAccessCode="01" defaultInd="true" extension="237" id="telephone_3" pIN="1234" phoneNumber="5555555" remark="Don't call after 10:00PM" role="Mobile">
        <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="Unknown" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="No" shareSyncInd="Inherit"/>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>Home</ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>Pager</ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>Emergency contact</ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>
    </ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail>
    <ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail areaCityCode="202" countryAccessCode="01" defaultInd="true" extension="237" id="telephone_4" pIN="1234" phoneNumber="5555555" remark="Don't call after 10:00PM" role="Other">
        <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>Managing company</ota2-0400:PhoneLocationType>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>TTY</ota2-0400:PhoneTechType>
        <ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>Evening contact</ota2-0400:PhoneUseType>
    </ota2-0400:TelephoneDetail>
    <SpokenLanguages alternateLanguages="es fr de" primaryLanguage="en"/>
    <Review language="en" text="5: Excellent" textFormat="PlainText"/>
</Driver>

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        PersonNameSummary
        This provides name information for a person.
        Details
        Type PersonName_Summary
        Example Value ???
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        TelephoneDetail
        Information about a telephone number, including the actual number and its usage.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Telephone_Detail_List
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 4
        SpokenLanguages
        One or more languages spoken by a person.
        Details
        Type LanguagesSpoken
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Review
        Review's score from 0 to 5, where 5 is the best.
        Details
        Type Review
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
